description:
Session-level metadata for a Course

This is for persistent, session-scoped information. Processing metadata (provider, model, latency) belongs on the Shuttle.

tokenizer_hint.description: Model-specific tokenizer hint (e.g., "cl100k_base" for Claude/GPT-4) Used to select the appropriate token counter

total_history_tokens.description: Total tokens in history (cached for fast pruning decisions) Updated on each commit_message() call

title: CourseMetadata
